channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Most Women Are On Crazy Pills, And It’s Bad For Everyone
item.description: An entire generation of women is lost amidst engineered anxiety, chasing hollow independence while forsaking the proven anchors of marriage, family, a...

item.title: The Government vs. Animal Lovers
item.description: If you enjoy the company of animals, the government may deem you a criminal.

item.title: The 50-Year Mortgage Would Make Things Worse for Gen Z
item.description: This is not the answer to the housing crisis.

item.title: Don’t Bet the House on the 50-Year Mortgage
item.description: President Trump’s proposed reform would be a terrible deal for homebuyers and taxpayers alike.

item.title: Trump to Supreme Court: Erase case over food stamps
item.description: The end of the government shutdown means food stamp benefits are flowing again, and the Justice Department told the Supreme Court to dismiss a case in...

item.title: This Time, It’s the Populists Who Are Underestimating Trump
item.description: The idea that another candidate can win in 2028 with a purer version of Buchananism ignores the president’s actual appeal.

item.title: Judge says DOJ can prosecute assault case against Rep. McIver
item.description: A federal judge allowed the federal prosecution of Rep. LaMonica McIver to proceed Thursday, rejecting her attempt to have the case tossed over claims...

item.title: Fighting to Preserve the American Experiment
item.description: The conservative movement is needed today more than ever, especially as the alternatives fail.

item.title: New report finds federal workforce grows slowly while pay skyrockets
item.description: The federal civilian workforce is growing modestly, but its pay has grown nearly fivefold since 2020, with an 80% increase in government workers who p...

item.title: Justice Gorsuch: ‘The Greatest Danger America Faces Today’ Is ‘Itself’
item.description: 'Thomas Jefferson said an ignorant people will never remain free for long, and he's right,' Justice Gorsuch said.

item.title: Judge will decide in weeks whether to toss criminal cases against James Comey, Letitia James
item.description: A federal judge plans to rule by Thanksgiving on a motion to toss out criminal cases against former FBI Director James B. Comey and New York Attorney ...

item.title: Calling It ‘Biden’s FBI’ Diminishes The Real Threat Of A Bureaucracy Gone Wild
item.description: The corruption didn’t begin under Biden, and it won’t end under a Republican administration.

item.title: Newsom’s Ex-Chief Of Staff Indicted For Fraud Scheme Stealing Campaign Funds With Biden Official
item.description: Dana Williamson and others allegedly conspired to steal around $225,000 from Xavier Becerra’s dormant political campaign funds.

item.title: Sen. Fetterman's fall on his face sends him to hospital
item.description: Sen. John Fetterman was hospitalized Thursday after falling during a walk near his home in Pennsylvania, his spokesperson said on social media.
